sndlib.core.io.xml
Class SNDlibXmlParser

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.io.xml.SNDlibXmlParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
SNDlibParser
public class SNDlibXmlParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements SNDlibParser

This SNDlibParser implementation handles the SNDlib XML format.

Instances of this class should not be created directly but obtained by calling the static factory method of SNDlibIOFactory.

The SNDlib XML format is described on the SNDlib webpage

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
SNDlibIOFactory, SNDlibIOFormat.XML
